subject: Expand test profile with CRM entity resolution test cases (task 8)
description:
Added 29 CRM entity resolution test cases (TC094-TC122) to test-fixtures/test-profile.json covering all tasks 8.1-8.8:
- 8.1: Company match (exact, phonetic, alias, ambiguous null, no match) - TC094-TC098
- 8.2: Company cross-reference (with/without contact) - TC099-TC100
- 8.3: Contact match (full name, partial/ASR, single name, ambiguous) - TC101-TC104
- 8.4: Ticket multi-selection (best match, weak evidence, temporal, resource) - TC105-TC108
- 8.5: Ticket verification (follow-up, placeholder, different problem, vague, zero-ticket) - TC109-TC112, TC122
- 8.6: Taxonomy classification (clear, type-only, too vague, with article) - TC113-TC116
- 8.7: Combined categories (caller+routing+resolution, all subsections) - TC117-TC118
- 8.8: Resolution profiles (exact_only, phonetic_tolerant, custom threshold) - TC119-TC121

Also updated run-test-profile.js:587 to pass candidate_sets, resolution_subsections, resolution_config, conversation_context, integration_context, and input_timestamp to webhook payload.

Evidence: `test-fixtures/test-profile.json:7` test_count: 122, all 193 local vitest tests passing.
activeForm: Expanding test profile with CRM entity resolution cases
